infoPlist.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: RunFlow needs access to read your health data to provide personalized insights and track your fitness progress
infoPlist.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: RunFlow needs access to save your workouts to Apple Health
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: RunFlow uses your location to track your runs, calculate distance, and show your route on the map.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: RunFlow needs background location access to track your run even when the screen is off or you open another app.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: RunFlow needs location access to track your runs and progress accurately.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: RunFlow needs access to your photos to let you share workout summaries and create stories.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: RunFlow needs permission to save workout result images to your photo library.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: RunFlow needs camera access to let you take photos for your workout stories.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: RunFlow needs microphone access for video features.
infoPlist.NSMotionUsageDescription: RunFlow uses motion data to track your steps and cadence.
infoPlist.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: This identifier will be used to deliver personalized content to you and improve app features.
infoPlist.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: RunFlow uses Bluetooth if you choose to connect heart rate monitors or other fitness accessories.
infoPlist.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: RunFlow uses Bluetooth if you choose to connect heart rate monitors or other fitness accessories.
